excerpt: "The recall includes 2016-2023 Model S, Model X; 2017-2023 Model 3; and 2020-2023 Model Y vehicles equipped with Full Self-Driving Beta (FSD Beta) software or pending installation, according to documents filed with the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration."
